function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Increased public engagement with emerging research","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate data sharing and reporting in medical research","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of standardized and accessible data formats","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High variability and lack of monitoring in guidance for data sharing","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Rapid sharing of molecular data may lead to unintentional release of sensitive information.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate data collection and efforts may lead to ineffective management of contagious diseases.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Existing technological, sociological, and operational barriers may hinder the impact of digital-health technologies.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Potential transmission of contagious diseases to other individuals due to interaction with contributors","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of bias or conflict of interest in the research due to the financial interests of contributors","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Global economic recession","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of sustainability in globalized system","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased zoonotic infections due to deforestation and wildlife hunting","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Deterioration of biodiversity reduces ecosystem functioning and protective effects against infectious diseases","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Intensive animal husbandry promotes the appearance and spread of zoonotic diseases","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Contagious diseases propagating in the built environment due to workforce shortage and structural limitations in food and health systems","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Global health care systems reaching capacity limits","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Severe restrictions to mobility exacerbating social inequalities","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Global connectivity and trade promote the use of cheap and long-distance transportation, increasing the risk of contagious diseases spreading globally.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Restricted mobility and economic activity during the covid-19 crisis led to improved air quality but uncertain impact on climate change and biodiversity conservation.","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Drop in greenhouse gas emissions during lockdowns, driven by reduced transportation and energy demand, drew attention.","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Prioritization of economy over sustainability may lead to relaxation of conservation policies and environmental measures.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Financial support directed at incumbent industries with high employment may hinder the development of green energy technologies.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Unsuitable use of global recovery funds could result in inadequate investment in sustainable energy development.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Global reliance on fossil fuels and lack of subsidies for sustainable alternatives","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Failure to achieve sustainable development goals sdgs by 2030","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of policies addressing the interrelation between biodiversity conservation, food security, and pandemic prevention","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Tropical deforestation and wildlife trade increasing the risk of future zoonosis outbreaks","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Economic growth contributing to biodiversity loss and environmental degradation","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Prioritization of gdp over human well-being and healthy environment","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of compliance with public health measures","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of transparent and effective governance","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Delay in implementing adequate controlling measures","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of adherence to collective actions","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inequality leading to social unrest","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate institutional trust","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of regulation on air and water quality, leading to negative environmental consequences.","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Resistance to bottom-up planning and cultural preferences impacting environmental adaptation.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased likelihood of contagious diseases due to individualistic societies and unsustainable consumption patterns","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Detachment of people from the biosphere leading to difficulty in caring for nature","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Shift in worldview from technological utopia to dependence on ecosystems","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Age and marital status as predictors of hiv infection","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Spatial clustering of hiv cases in specific provinces","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of access to gynecologic oncologist specialists for rural women with ovarian cancer","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Disparities in referral rates for rural women with ovarian cancer","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Longer time from diagnosis to surgery for rural women with ovarian cancer","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of proper ventilation in buildings can lead to airborne transmission of contagious diseases.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Poor sanitation and hygiene practices can facilitate the spread of contagious diseases within buildings.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Overcrowding and close proximity of individuals in buildings can contribute to rapid disease spread.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of targeted, non-coercive community interventions","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Incomplete or inaccurate communication from health authorities","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"}]}
